customer_reviews.title: Went rancid quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love this enough to use it regularly. The texture was kind of thick and oily, and I feel that it went rancid rather quickly - developed that 'old oil' smell. Maybe it should be stored in the fridge until you're ready to open the bottle. I had a MyChelle moisturizer/night creme that I absolutely loved so I thought this might get me to wear sunblock on my acne-prone face more often. I wonder if this was a bad batch or some old stock. For me, not worth the money. I just wear giant hats instead.

feature_bullets: PROTECT YOUR SKIN: MyChelle’s Sun Shield SPF 28 Coconut formula provides broad-spectrum sun protection. It keeps your skin healthier and reduces the appearance of sun damage.

LIGHTWEIGHT: Our Sun Shield is a lightweight formula that gets absorbed quickly for a smooth, clear, and matte finish. This can be either worn alone for a fresh and healthy shine, or as a protective primer under make-up to create a smooth matte finish.

MINERAL BASED FORMULA: This mineral based formula with SPF 28 has Zinc Oxide as the premier natural mineral sunscreen ingredient that is SAFER, effective and broad spectrum. It physically blocks harmful, damaging solar rays and the minerals deflects rays to help protect and prevent accelerated deterioration of the skin. The addition of soothing Aloe and a high-performance blend of antioxidants, including Vitamin E, help to reduce the signs of sun-induced irritation

USAGE DIRECTIONS: It takes approximately 15 minutes for your skin to absorb the sunscreen and protect you. Waiting once you’re in the sun to apply can leave your skin unprotected and susceptible to burns. Apply this generously to your face and body before going outdoors.

SAFER: Our sun shield is vegan, reef SAFER and biodegradable. This is made without GMO, gluten, parabens, petroleum, phthalates, silicones, sulfates, urea, artificial fragrances and artificial colors.
